price: ߡߍ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߓߊ߯ ߞߍ߫ ߛߎߡߊ߲ߠߌ߲ ߕߊ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߡߐ߱ ߟߎ߫ ߞߎ߲߬ ( ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߖߘߍ߬ ߦߋ߫ ) ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߘߴߏ߬ ߟߝߊ߫ ߞߏ ߢߌߣߌ߲߫
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكۡتَالُواْ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسۡتَوۡفُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna idhā ik'tālū ʿalā al-nāsi yastawfūna
